name: packaging production for pesticide, per kilogram of packed product | packaging, for pesticides | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22100/documentation

This dataset represents the production and disposal of packaging material needed to pack 1 kg of liquid pesticides used at the farm. ;Based on measured data, 1.160 kg of plastic is needed for a plastic container that can deliver 20 liters of liquid pesticides. The dataset considers all pesticides to be in a liquid form. The reference product (1 kg) represents the packaging necessary for the respective amount of pesticide used on the farm level. Therefore, this dataset should be used considering the amount of the active substance present in the pesticide and the final amount of pesticide (that contains the active substance dilluted) that is packed and finally applied in the field, i.e.: 1 kg of packaging for pesticides should be used per 0.5 kg of input of pesticide active substance - assuming here a dillution rate of 2 (parts of pesticide per part of active substance).;The activity is also considering the wastes generated by the use of packaging for pesticides on the farm level, so no addition of the waste is needed in the agricultural dataset.

This activity starts with the reception of the HDPE granulates and production of the plastic container for packaging liquid pesticides.

The dataset is also considering the production of the HDPE container, weighting 1.160 kg and able to deliver 20 kg of liquid pesticides. The container is produced with
 injection moulding. This activity ends with the disposal of waste packaging.
category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Measured values originate from the Swiss Federal Office for Agriculture.

exchanges.description: The reference product represents the production of the packaging material that is needed to store 1 kg of liquid pesticides (or fertilisers) in a 20 liter plastic container.

flow.name: packaging, for pesticides
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

exchanges.description: This waste exchange is taking into account the waste polyethylene that is produced after the application of the pesticide.

flow.name: waste polyethylene
flow.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste

exchanges.description: A plastic container to store 20 liter of liquide pesticides weights 1.160 kg (mesured data) which is 0.0058 kg packaging per kg stored liquor. The injection moulding process requiers 0.0583501 kg of HDPE since 1.0 kg product of this process equals 0.994 kg of injection moulded plastics.
